name: Souten Exorcism
text:
Target 1 "Souten" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them, then, if you destroyed a "Souten" Fusion Monster you controlled, you can apply 1 of these effects.
- Draw 1 card.
- Banish 1 card from your opponent's GY.
You can only activate 1 "Souten Exorcism" per turn.
